title: CONSOLIDATED STATEMENTS OF OPERATIONS - USD ($)shares in Millions, $ in Millions

null.label: Sales
null.definition: Amount, excluding tax collected from customer, of revenue from satisfaction of performance obligation by transferring promised good or service to customer. Tax collected from customer is tax assessed by governmental authority that is both imposed on and concurrent with specific revenue-producing transaction, including, but not limited to, sales, use, value added and excise.

null.label: Merchandise costs, including advertising, warehousing, and transportation, excluding items shown separately below
null.definition: The aggregate cost of goods produced and sold during the reporting period, excluding depreciation, depletion, and amortization.

null.label: Operating, general and administrative
null.definition: The aggregate total of expenses of managing and administering the affairs of an entity, including affiliates of the reporting entity, which are not directly or indirectly associated with the manufacture, sale or creation of a product or product line, excluding rental expense incurred for leased assets including furniture and equipment which has not been recognized in costs and expenses applicable to sales and revenues; for example, cost of goods sold or other operating costs and expenses.

null.label: Rent
null.definition: Amount of rent expense incurred for leased assets, including but not limited to, furniture and equipment, that is not directly or indirectly associated with the manufacture, sale or creation of a product or product line.

null.label: Depreciation and amortization
null.definition: The aggregate expense recognized in the current period that allocates the cost of tangible assets, intangible assets, or depleting assets to periods that benefit from use of the assets.

null.label: Operating profit
null.definition: The net result for the period of deducting operating expenses from operating revenues.

null.label: Interest expense
null.definition: Amount of the cost of borrowed funds accounted for as interest expense.

null.label: Non-service component of company-sponsored pension plan costs
null.definition: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for net periodic benefit cost components, excluding service cost component, of defined benefit plan. Amount includes, but is not limited to, interest cost, expected (return) loss on plan asset, amortization of prior service cost (credit), amortization of (gain) loss, amortization of transition (asset) obligation, settlement (gain) loss, curtailment (gain) loss and certain termination benefits.

null.label: Mark to market gain (loss) on Ocado securities
null.definition: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI).

null.label: Gain on sale of business
null.definition: Amount before tax of gain (loss) recognized on the sale or disposal of a disposal group. Excludes discontinued operations.

null.label: Net earnings before income tax (benefit) expense
null.definition: Amount of income (loss) from continuing operations before deduction of income tax expense (benefit) and income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest, and addition of income (loss) from equity method investments.

null.label: Income tax (benefit) expense
null.definition: Amount of current income tax expense (benefit) and deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to continuing operations.

null.label: Net earnings including noncontrolling interests
null.definition: The consolidated profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, including the portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest.

null.label: Net loss attributable to noncontrolling interests
null.definition: Amount of Net Income (Loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest.

null.label: Net earnings attributable to The Kroger Co.
null.definition: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent.

null.label: Net earnings attributable to The Kroger Co. per basic common share
null.definition: The amount of net income (loss) for the period per each share of common stock or unit outstanding during the reporting period.

null.label: Average number of common shares used in basic calculation
null.definition: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

null.label: Net earnings attributable to The Kroger Co. per diluted common share
null.definition: The amount of net income (loss) for the period available to each share of common stock or common unit outstanding during the reporting period and to each share or unit that would have been outstanding assuming the issuance of common shares or units for all dilutive potential common shares or units outstanding during the reporting period.

null.label: Average number of common shares used in diluted calculation
null.definition: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.
